UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Amino Terminal Copper and Nickel Binding Motif Derivatives of Ovispirin-3 Display Increased Antimicrobial Activity via Lipid Oxidation.
Literature.Author: Alexander JL, Yu Z, Cowan JA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>16µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=16µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=5.3µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=16µM),Streptococcus pneumoniae(MIC=8µM),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=8µM)
